testcase.name: Test Case 12
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Products' button to see products.......................passed Then User hovers over first product and click 'Add to cart'.................passed Then User clicks 'Continue Shopping' button to continue.....................passed Then User hovers over second product and click 'Add to cart'................passed Then User click 'View Cart' button..........................................passed Then Verify both products are added to Cart.................................passed Then Verify their prices, quantity and total price..........................passed
